website_summaries.verdict: The ONE Light Keyboard connects to your phone or tablet and uses light-up keys to teach how to play, but many songs cost extra and there isn't much to do once you master the basics.
cons: Large amount of content locked behind paywall
Video lessons are for beginners only

customer_reviews.title: Some of them are easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself. When I was young, there is no chance to learn piano or any other instrument. Now with this keyboard, I can learn piano with the apps. I tried several songs in the app. Some of them are easy to follow, but others are a little bit difficult. Recently, I practice playing with this keyboard 30min everyday. (Don't need to drive to the teacher.) I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Liu

customer_reviews.title: Really nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is good, I have spent the last week about 2 hours day playing, I have never touch any other instrument, and I can say that I'm actually playing piano after 3 days, it awesome. The only problem is the cable for to connect the tablet is really bad, and I have not been able to play for 2 days because the cable is not working, and now I have to spend 40 dollars in a cable that last 4 days....
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Cool keyboard but expensive songs
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed that the songs through the APP are $3.99 each. It’s best for someone who has some musical knowledge and the ability to read music- my son has to learn the basics firsr
customer_reviews.author: Hey’all

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound & Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great 61 keyboard for beginners. This is a quality piece and works seamlessly with my iPad. The audio is enough for me but i can imagine some may want more volume. Speakers can be easily plugged in. If I had any complaints, it would be that there aren’t enough app programs to use. When you pay $3.99 for an app and it’s too difficult (Level 1), something’s wrong. More beginner apps needed.
customer_reviews.author: TrishInHouston

customer_reviews.title: Fun, engaging way to learn to play
customer_reviews.text: I"m a little worried about this purchase. I've loved it the first few days. Well yesterday, my son was playing away on it and plugged in his iPad and all of a sudden, it wasn't producing any sound. We unplugged the iPad and it started working again. You are supposed to plug in your iPad to play games and do lessons, but it's no fun without the keys making sound. After unplugging it and turning it off and back on, it started working again. Overall, it's tons of fun with the games and ways it teaches you to play. I just hope we didn't get a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: KristyW

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I play this keyboard for hours everyday. Sounds great and has a huge volume range. I love how you can change the type of sound that comes out of the keyboard. I’ve learned many great songs on this keyboard. It’s amazing for any beginners and for any experienced
customer_reviews.author: Coledlp

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard itself is nice if you only want to play the keys
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is nice if you only want to play the keys. But if you're buying this for the perk of being able to use the app, be prepared for disappointment. We bought it for our kids for Christmas, after verifying that our Kindle Fires would work with it. It worked at first, but a few weeks after Christmas they put out an update and stopped supporting Kindle Fires. So we got an Android that they supported. We were unable to get android to work and contacted them for support. They have no trouble shooting for problems available. None! Ridiculous. Cool concept, but needs a TON of refining to have a usable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda D Law

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully fixed
customer_reviews.text: So we had a problem with our piano very quickly and the manufacturer was really good with communicating with me and getting the issue fixed quickly. The cord that connects the piano and tablet wasn't worrying. Not sure why but it works great again!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work with the app
customer_reviews.text: Currently I’m extremely frustrated. i bought this piano (along with a tablet) to learn to play and the app that supposedly works with it won’t connect or recognize it. would rather have saved my money and bought a better piano to learn on rather than wasting it on a tablet and an app that doesn’t work with this. The tones available are also very low quality, i didn’t have high expectations as it’s a “learn to play” piano but even for a beginning piano it’s been pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: glen and jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard--love the pink!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome keyboard for beginners like me! It even has this app that you can use on your iPad in tandem with the keyboard (the keys even light up when you connect it to the app for practice). I love the pink too! I am having an absolute blast learning to play the piano with this keyboard. I 100% recommend for anyone wanting to learn the piano (also purchase some note stickers for the keys--they have been a great help for me)!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Heard a lot of good things about the One piano so I bought one for myself . The product is nicely packaged and the white and gold color combo is very chic! The keyboard itself is easy to use and the app is very self explainatory. It’s light and does not take much space. It’s also a good gift option for both adults and kids and is reasonably priced given the quality of this product. Im very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Should’ve got the 88 key piano
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had paid more and got the 88 key, because you can’t play the beautiful moonlight sonata game. There are beautiful music available but 61 key does not work. Or maybe they could improve their programs and make those music be able to play on the 61 key piano, then it would be perfect. It’s fun, it’s like playing piano tile except on a real keyboard. How awesome is that.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy B

customer_reviews.title: good but not help learning.
customer_reviews.text: Just like a toy but not for the person who want to learn how to play piano, but good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Noraaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Piano is great, app is useless
customer_reviews.text: The piano itself is great. It's nice to look at and sounds good. It's great that it comes with the cables to connect it to a smart phone or tablet. However, the app is ridiculous. It is practically impossible for a beginner to learn this way. After 2 weeks of frustration I paid $100 for an annual subscription to a different app and I'm well on my way to being able to play proficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Ka Bax

customer_reviews.title: The crash chorus works very good..
customer_reviews.text: The video lessons...not available. The crash chorus works very good...but less than 20 songs. The games....again only a handful. It looks nice, it sounds good....but with the things they are bragging about as features available in such limited supply I feel a bit conned.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Monger

customer_reviews.title: Apparently there's no help readily available.
customer_reviews.text: I cannot connect this "The ONE Smart Piano Keyboard with Lighted Keys, Electric Piano 61 keys, Home Digital Music Keyboard, Teaching Porta..... " to my MacBook Pro or MiniMac computer. It did connect to my Samsung Note Tablet but I want to use my Mac's. I've tried for two days and it's very frustrating. There's no manual and I cannot find help online, etc.. If I'm not successful It is being returned.
customer_reviews.author: LightnBreezy13

customer_reviews.title: great concept but the App for the Kindle abysmal
customer_reviews.text: How disappointing, great concept but the App for the Kindle abysmal! First, it uses Japanese / Chinese as the language almost all of the time. Once in a while it will use English, can't tell why or how to force language to be English. Second, it almost always reports failure code 50003. Third, it doesn't respond to any use input. Really, did anybody even try to use this app before putting it in the Amazon App Store? Without a working App controlling the lighted keys, it looses all of its advantage over the competition. Sorry, something this bad has to be returned,
customer_reviews.author: Peggy S Cagle

customer_reviews.title: I wish the app worked!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to download the app on FOUR devices, and I cannot get a full version to download. I get a few kids games, and a few some lessons... Not compatible with Kindle, Google Tablet, new Fire Kindle.... Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KMcKnRose

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner piano
customer_reviews.text: We have had this piano for our 10 year old daughter and she had loved it!!! Good quality and I personally love how it looks nice and modern verses the typical black and white.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: great value - started playing songs my first week
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Once i got everything hooked up I was learning a song almost instantly. I did notice the cord that connects from the keyboard to the my ipad has to be from this company to work. Was about $40. Also the keyboard once you get rolling does seem to have a bit of a quality issue for how hard you push the keys. Mind you this was well after I learned 6 songs. This is great for beginners I'm moving up to the larger weighted keys to continue learning. This was a great bang for its buck, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Julian K.

customer_reviews.title: Keys don’t light up but is great otherwise
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s the app, piano, or cord but the keys won’t light up. I’ve been messaging amazon since week 1 and now it’s too late to return. I just ordered a new phone cord to see if that’s the problem. It otherwise plays beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Desarae

customer_reviews.title: Horrible..... don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this piano! There is absolutely no support and the warranty is useless. There is no phone number for support so after waiting several days for a solution, the email I received said “ I wonder if it worked well before, I look forward to your response”. I’ve had this piano just a few months
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Eskew

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality, Bought two both have failures
customer_reviews.text: Idea is good. But the electronics is badly designed. I guess this company does not have top designers to make electronics work stable and well. USB connection worked for some days and then you simply cannot connect anymore. Piano sound quality and tone can not even be labeled as a "piano".
customer_reviews.author: Yang Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and this can teach you like a pro
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my daughter, and she loved it a lot😊 if you want to learn this is a great investment as u can download the app and learn to play all by yourself this is truely a blessing if you do not want to spen on tutors
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great keyboard for beginners or someone who wants to have ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great keyboard for beginners or someone who wants to have fun. I bought it for my 5-year old daughter. When I connected it to the power and the Android tablet, she was so excited to learn how to play with the app. I am glad that low volume is quite low. For my daughter, it is not only a musical instrument but also a fun toy. Sometimes, she even wants to play it before she goes to bed. This is a great product and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend setting up an account before buying this to see ...
customer_reviews.text: I do not have any musical skills, however with this I'm able to plink out some basic songs and feel rewarded. The keyboard is largely no-frills, there is a button that cycles through 15ish different musical instruments. Setting up the app on the iphone does require a free account from ONE Music Group. Although there are many free sheet music that you can use, if you want to use a more popular current music then be prepared to for additional costs. I recommend setting up an account before buying this to see the prices.
customer_reviews.author: Ro Yo Mi

customer_reviews.title: I Can Practice Without Annoying Anyone!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 65 and just learning to play the piano. I can put the headphones on and practice in private without annoying my wife. The keyboard works with any number of apps. I tried several and ended up using Skoove.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: the piano works and has many different activities but i lost the cord that connects the piano to the ipad so if you sell that seperately that would be helpful
customer_reviews.author: senguun munkhtsetseg

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids sit down all the time to play. They both have ADD and traditional piano lessons were very boring for them. They use their ipads daily and sit down to do a lesson or learn a new song. They rarely sat at our piano, but this they use all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for beginner
customer_reviews.text: I still use it now. I feel like this is going to be a toy I can play with for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amukta

customer_reviews.title: I'll give it a 10
customer_reviews.text: You should put the 15.77 back in my acct. My daughter ❤ her new paino thank you
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Works as advertised. I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works as advertised. I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.Redd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for beginners and guitar hero players
customer_reviews.text: This piano helped me learn the basics. My main worry about not having a teacher was learning improper finger positioning. But this app trains just that well, in addition the light feedback, it was overall fun to learn.
customer_reviews.author: jayson

customer_reviews.title: Will not last
customer_reviews.text: At first this was a great product. My kids were really enjoying it. However the integrity of the keys wore out and 3 already broke and no longer work. I do not see anyway of repairing it. I’m outside of my return window so I’m guessing I’m stuck with this paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Josh

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for only one month and I can already hear a high pitch feedback when I play. I’m quite busy with work and haven’t even played it that much! Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Diego N.

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is horrible. Not enough songs unless you spend more money. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: flok

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Amazing keyboard daughter loves it comes with all cords and just so amazing love
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice keyboard. Suitable for kids and adults, no matter whether you have experience with musical instrument. For me, I know how to play the piano since I was a kid but it has been years since the last time I practiced my piano playing skills. It's a nice product helps to pick it back up. It's portable (compared to piano) and I can play it at night use earphones without disturbing my neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Just a little more volume power and it would be perfect but ultimately a very solid starter piano my daughter will adore it thanks yall
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Wayne Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Their site is down and can't login
customer_reviews.text: iPad app is not working anymore and on their website I can't Login. Without the app this is just a normal keyboard without teaching ability.
customer_reviews.author: Homayoun Najafizadeh

customer_reviews.title: Not functioning as advertised
customer_reviews.text: App is horrible and it doesn’t recognize that my phone is connected resulting in the lights not turning on which was the reason I bought the piano. Didn’t work on either my phone or my wife’s device both apparently supported new IPhone 10 devices. I received a new piano after requesting a refund. The new package didn’t come with a power cable.
customer_reviews.author: David Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, nice look
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter to learn. My daughter absolutely loves music so I found the cost more then worth it and appearance wise it's not an eye sore. My biggest thing was that I didn't want something that was more toy than instrument.
customer_reviews.author: acelynn1

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice build quality and a good implementation of sheet music ...
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice build quality and a good implementation of sheet music thru the app, plus it's a midi controller to a PC
customer_reviews.author: j chaves

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves it... easy to hook up to an IPad.. she was playing songs in just a few minutes!
customer_reviews.author: APonder

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners only thing is the music cost money it adds up pretty quick
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: Much much Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Supports all iOS apps and MacBook. Tried in GarageBand. Sounds awesome. Hope they can make a hammer action version.
customer_reviews.author: I'S ISAACSONG

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Is there no way to reach customer service except email? I have a major problem with my brand new piano and I’m only getting one reply per day!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Himy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Speakers are great! And piano looks very classy. Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: No skills to Happy Birthday in 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: My kids learned to play happy birthday in about 2 days just in time for my wife's birthday! I recommend it! I found this at the Edison Awards in NYC.
customer_reviews.author: Cody P Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: Very professional
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, easy to use, and light and compact to carry to different locations
customer_reviews.author: T shirt buyer

customer_reviews.title: You’ve to pay a monthly fee
customer_reviews.text: You’ve to pay a monthly fee for the training program.
customer_reviews.author: Michael turner

customer_reviews.title: Speeds on practices should include very slow ones as well
customer_reviews.text: During traings It needs to include speed adjustments to be also very slow... Most of the practices are fast
customer_reviews.author: Sileshi Zewdie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Learning!  Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Loving this keyboard! Don't have time to go out and take lessons so the ONE Light does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Birchway

customer_reviews.title: it is very convenient and the sound quality is so good.
customer_reviews.text: I brought it to church to teach the kids singing, it is very convenient and the sound quality is so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: works like no other has great sound I wish they had fat rat unity as one song in the program everyone would like to see me play that on youtube
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: haha The piano has a nice design and sounds well
customer_reviews.text: Because I am going to graduate, i want to sell this item, i only play it one time. I would like to sell it at $100, if in New York city, we can meet and trade, if in other area and you want it, you need to pay the shipping fee. please reply my comment if you are interested.
customer_reviews.author: jessieliu0214

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was so happy!! You get immediate gratification, you make music!!!!
customer_reviews.author: james reyes

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2019
customer_reviews.text: We love it! It works great with the app. The sound is great. My daughter (and I) spend hours on it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: It claims to offer piano lessons, yeah, not really, you also have to pay for a subscription to get anything, it’s not very loud, it’s heavy and you have to cycle through things pressing the next button to get to another sound, no display
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really like it helps a lot for learning and finding notes with the right keys
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Kruse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the piano it works perfect with my Iphone8 plus
customer_reviews.author: MBrown4211

customer_reviews.title: It’s fun. Works good
customer_reviews.text: It’s fun. Works good. The songs that come with it aren’t great. You can buy more. Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous, worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This was a fabulous product I bought with decent price! Like the feeling of the keyboard and I can use while being a couch potato haha. Finally get to involve more in music so easily~~
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard for learning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who would like to learn how to play music. So far everything is working as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My grandchildren are really enjoying the piano and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren are really enjoying the piano and it is true with a little practice they can play songs just following the light.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Tablet adaptability
customer_reviews.text: My tablet wont connect to it, i cant have rhe keys light up :-(
customer_reviews.author: Joseph V Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this piano! My son has learned so much and its a great buy. Great quality 💕
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof4gr8kids

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Perfect keyboard! Really a fantastic product for newbies like me. I like the color, the sound and the app. It was always hard for me to learn music instruments, since I barely know anything about rhythm or sheet music. But with this keyboard, I can even play Beethoven Fur Elise after practicing for only HALF DAY!Thanks to the app and the light-up keys. There are also plenty of classic sheet music and free video lessons in the app. I will definitely keep learning.
customer_reviews.author: Kelps

customer_reviews.title: The keys light up great and it's easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a family gift for Christmas. This is s hit! Every single person including my husband has been using this everyday. Learning music, playing their own music and so forth. The keys light up great and it's easy to follow. The only thing I would say is that it would be easier to use a tablet for app because of a bigger screen then a smart phone. Other than that it's perfect. My husband as added a guitar to the set and wants to start a family "band". Lol Whatever keeps the family spending time together!!
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Martin

customer_reviews.title: Top notch. This was exactly what i was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: Top notch . This was exactly what i was looking for to train with .
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this piano
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this piano. I can't read music but with this piano since the keys light up is very very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Chante ivy

customer_reviews.title: Great learning piano
customer_reviews.text: So my daughter is 17 months old. This is way to complicated for her, but the IPad and light keys keep her attention and she enjoys smashing the keys. I can play the songs and play along with her and it's a lot of fun. It is annoying that the 88 key songs don't play right, they should just play the tunes and not have the key. It makes the songs seem empty.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: Top quality and fun !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the One Light for about a month now, the build quality of the keyboard is really nice and high quality, it really feels solid and high end, everything was in the box cords and connectors, all there! It's also really fun the lit keys make it fun and really helpful, I've never played before but I'm learning! And I could see if you were a piano player in the past, this piano and app will get you playing again in no-time !! This really makes the learning process quite fun!!!! Shawn S.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: well designed product was my first impression when I received the keyboard. I finally start to play with it today, and I think it would be a wise choice no matter you are a beginner pr intermediate player. The tutorial videos are demonstrated by Lang Lang and the courses are easy to follow. (you have to download the app first) It's portable and fairly light, so it will be a good pick if you travel or move pretty often. I will definitely recommend this product to those who are interested in getting a keyboard. More comments will be coming soon once I get addicted to it.
customer_reviews.author: Wenyue Li

customer_reviews.title: This is a really great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: TABLET NOT INCLUDED The description really was not clear on whether there was one included or not. I assumed not but it never said "Tablet not included" even on the box. SO YOU WILL NEED TO PURCHASE/PROVIDE one of your own. This is a really great learning tool. Piano takes lots of practice and the games help.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Garton

customer_reviews.title: Great piano but expensive songs on app...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my 3year old. He loves it and follows the lighted keys! I love it too! The one thing I didn’t like is that the app has very limited free songs. And the rest are pay per song... the cost is unrealistic at $3~ per song...
customer_reviews.author: dantran99

customer_reviews.title: Very nice keyboard. My three year old really enjoys the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice keyboard. My three year old really enjoys the piano so we bought her this keyboard to start learning. The LED lights help guide her and she follows along nicely. Great product for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: J.Y.

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THIS KEYBOARD!!!
customer_reviews.text: WE LOVE THIS KEYBOARD!!! Technology is awesome. I have never seen anything like this. May daughter is playing songs she has wished to be able to play; now with the app loaded on the smartphone and ipad she can play anything. We are both loving it. The games are fun to play also or you can just play by ear any song. This is a very nice keyboard. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Synthesia won't light up keys??????
customer_reviews.text: Can you please provide a clear direction on how to get synthesia app to work with the One light keyboard? I have followed the instructions to connect the two apps but the keyboard lights won't work!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Teichman

customer_reviews.title: so this is good piano for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought the piano to learn, so this is good piano for me. But When I received the piano, I shocked about they just used the original piano box to ship. The box is already wear out. I opened it and I found out the piano also be used. The key board has the dirty marks. Some of the electric wires just are all opened. They just sold a used piano to me! This is really bad experience!!!
customer_reviews.author: tanfy

customer_reviews.title: five star absolutely!
customer_reviews.text: amazing product, my kids love it so much. strong recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid but needs work
customer_reviews.text: Pretty solid but needs work. My biggest issue is that I discovered this doing a search for MIDI controller and found this. The keyboard does connect to a pc/mac but nothing happens. Next issue and this could be user error but it's hard to do fingerings and even read songs when parts of of the treble part is put in the left hand. A metronome would be nice or have led lights take rhythm into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: theveggiejerk

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard itself is everything I expected. My only ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself is everything I expected. My only complaint would be that it was shipped without a power cable.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating experience
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard claims to be compatible with iPad 2 but it is not compatible with older version iPad 2. There is no way to contact the seller and the user's manual is incomplete.
customer_reviews.author: heroldova

customer_reviews.title: The device is good for learning piano
customer_reviews.text: The device is good for learning piano. I got it for a young relative. However the item has shipped to me was in white instead of black as I had specified in the original order. By then the gift had been given & opened and it was too late to reternal for an exchange.
customer_reviews.author: mns4n6

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok
customer_reviews.text: Misleading claims about compatibility with tablets. Also, the song selection is very limited. The user interface of the app could be greatly improved. But now that I have it, I am using it to help me learn to play the piano.
customer_reviews.author: Richard E

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. The smart piano apps does not work
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. The smart piano apps does not work. No customer service to contact from their website. Definitely a RETURN item.
customer_reviews.author: aileen alcano

customer_reviews.title: It's exellent!!!! but i 'll sujest ...
customer_reviews.text: It's exellent !!!!but i 'll sujest that they improved The one program for us !!! We nenes The 2 finger program!!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome keyboard. Worth every penny. Just wish they had more updates for the "Music Lab" part of the app.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Blades

customer_reviews.title: Ice sound but light up was not very useful and costed a lot extra
customer_reviews.text: Ice sound but light up was not very useful and costed a lot extra.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No power cable?
customer_reviews.text: Nice keyboard, will work with what I bought it for, however, did not come with a power cable. If anyone knows how to get one sent to me please let me know. Song choices I've wanted to play are very limited as every time I search the app I either can't find what I'm looking for or it is for 88 keys. They are also about 3.99 each. I'm undecided about returning this product for a Casio with songs already uploaded. Looks slick and it's convenient to be able to hook up my tablet/phone.
customer_reviews.author: Joe N.

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS!  This is a Super Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome keyboard. I haven't played piano in years and wanted to get back to it. The grand Piano sound is awesome. The keys are the right size and it feels just like playing a piano. I am looking forward to trying out the App and really enjoying the piano again.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Acres

customer_reviews.title: The piano is great, love to play it and it has good ...
customer_reviews.text: Piano work fine. If you are looking to get help from one music group, DONT T
customer_reviews.author: C. C.

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a good learning tool.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a lot of fun. Maybe one day I'll use it. :( I've plunked a couple songs on the lit keys, but I guess some people will never be a piano player no matter how much they want to be.
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: While the product might be great..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the one light keyboard to teach my kids how to play piano. Upon opening the box, there was no power cord. So, no way to power the piano. Still, I can't find any info on how or what exact power cord to use. Don't want to put the wrong type of power source and ruin the piano. Guess I expected more. While the product might be great...I can't use it without power and I didn't order it to be used with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ronnie Pace

customer_reviews.title: Casio vs Smart One
customer_reviews.text: So I got my grandson a Casio for $79 and it has virtually the same features. Since Smart One charges you for every piece of music to play it can become extremely expensive. If I could I would return this and buy a Casio Big difference between in price
customer_reviews.author: Kharrell

customer_reviews.title: Missing adapter plug to power keyboard, please send one as soon as possible so I can power and use this device.
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to come with an AC/DC adapter to power the device and mine didn't come with any plug at all, just the plugs for attaching an apple device.
customer_reviews.author: ihnc

customer_reviews.title: Nice piano, no US version for the iPhone app.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Got my piano today, after connecting everything it seems like there is no app bailable for download in the US???? Why do you guys sell it here if you don't have an app in the US! My phone won't let me download it unless I have an ITunes (Irish version!) that's very strange and messed up.
customer_reviews.author: T.Lee

customer_reviews.title: no cord to connect to my ipod or android device im very disappointed even the box was torn
customer_reviews.text: no manual . no power cord. no cord to connect to my ipod or android device im very disappointed even the box was torn.

customer_reviews.text: do not like - does what it says but I need the 88 keyboard.

product_meta.title: The ONE Smart Piano Keyboard with Lighted Keys, Electric Piano 61 keys, Home Digital Music Keyboard, Teaching Portable Keyboard Piano, Black
product_meta.description: Color:Onyx BlackThe one light is the most portable way to learn piano. With the synced LED lights in the keyboard, a beginner musician can start to play music in minutes, while professional musicians can have equal fun by choosing from thousands of free sheet music and over 128 instrument sounds Plus MIDI input/output to play. Just connect to our Free app The one smart piano, you can begin with the crash course and learn a song in minutes or choose a gaming mode with arcade style scoring. You can also choose from our library of over 3000 free music sheets or purchase the latest pop songs, and learn to play a piece note by note. The music progresses only when you play the correct piano key. In our other app one pianist, kids can enjoy the journey style learning game. This smart keyboard also adds MIDI compatibility and works with other MIDI based apps, such as yousician, piano Maestro, even garage band. It's fun and affordable for everyone. Get the one smart keyboard today and start play in minutes! .
feature_bullets: Magical LED Lighted on the keys of this 61 keyboard piano-Follow the LED light and you can play the piano in minutes.
Powerful educational functions in the Free APP of the electric portable keyboard piano-professional lessons videos, fun games with learning, creative crash course and thousands of sheet music.

Simple Appearance Design- abandoned the traditional complex button operation on the digital piano keyboard and limited content storage space. Connect with the APP named "The ONE". ,you will find everything you need. Free APP provide with endless possibility- unlimited music content and irregularly updated
With powerful built-in speakers and a 128-note maximum note polyphony. MIDI output and recording.
Playing piano has never been easy. This smart piano keyboard is your best way to learn.

128+ instrument sounds available via mobile app setting. Device/Connection- iOS 9.0 +, iPad 2/4, New Pad, iPad mini1/2/3/4, iPad Air1/2, iPad Pro, iPhone 5s/6/6 plus/6s/6s plus/7/7 plus/8/X, Android 4.4+ with USB Host/OTG
